name: Darker RES
description: A simple CSS that darkens the top banner ("My subreddits") in RES as well as sitewide scrollbars on reddit.
additional_info:
This is intended to work with RES' Night Mode. The banner will stay dark with night mode activated, but only certain elements of the scrollbar(s) will stay dark. I personally have night mode active at all times. Changelog 19.11.16
  • Most styling now depends on whether or not RES Night Mode is on
  • Styled a header element that I had missed
Initial release 16.11.16
  • Style published
